snippet: A plan by the Financial Accounting Standards Board would substantially reduce the use of market values in financial statements.
abstract: Financial Accounting Standards Board proposes to substantially reduce the use of market values in financial statements; move, if adopted, would give banks more freedom to value financial assets as they deem appropriate.
lead_paragraph: A plan by the Financial Accounting Standards Board would substantially reduce the use of market values in financial statements.

headline.seo: Rule Advances to Give Banks More Freedom to Value Assets
headline.main: Proposal Gives Banks More Freedom to Value Assets
headline.print_headline: For Banks, More Say On Assets
